meanings.definition: A person who works with their hands
meanings.sent1: The workmen built a sturdy fence around the garden.
meanings.sent2: The workmen repaired the roof of the old house.
meanings.sent3: The workmen joked about having paint fights during their break.
meanings.sent4: The workmen's hands were like tools, shaping the wood effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The workmen's dedication to their craft was evident in every detail of their work.

meanings.definition: The plural form of workman, referring to multiple individuals who perform manual labor.
meanings.sent1: The group of workmen arrived early to start the construction project.
meanings.sent2: The workmen were skilled in various trades, from carpentry to plumbing.
meanings.sent3: The workmen shared stories of their adventures on the job site.
meanings.sent4: The workmen moved in unison, like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The workmen's teamwork was the key to their efficiency on the job.
